description: A modular Telegram userbot running on Python 3.8 with an sqlalchemy database,

ALIVE_MESAJI.description: Custom message for .alive command. We have our own alive message by default.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules.

DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Download location for many modules (.download etc..)

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: Add the Heroku app name here. Required for updates.

HEROKU_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key, get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account. Required for updates.

LOG_ID.description: Chat ID of the Log group. If value is 0, log feature not work. If value is left blank, logs send in Saved Messages

LOG_VERBOSE.description: If you need verbosity on the console logging.

OCR_APIKEY.description: OCR API Key for .ocr command. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: PM Auto Ban Feature. Also known as 'bleep blop, this is a bot...'.

PM_MSG_COUNT.description: Custom PM Message Count for PM Auto Ban feature. Also known as Pmpermit Module.

PM_UNAPPROVED.description: Custom message for PM Auto Ban feature. Also known as Pmpermit Module.

RBG_APIKEY.description: RBG API Key for .rbg command. Get from https://www.remove.bg/api

REPO_URL.description: It helps your bot updates, if you maintain a fork repo you can add your repo URL here.

SEDEN_LANG.description: It permanently changes your bot's lang. Default is English (en).

SESSION.description: Get this value by running python3 session.py in terminal.

WEATHER.description: Set the default city for Seden UserBot's Weather Module.

name: Telegram SedenBot
